sentences.en: A full-scale character assassination of the dead woman got underway in the tabloid press.
sentences.cn: 小报上开始了对那位已故女士全方位的人身攻击。

sentences.en: But this story begins with the most famous assassination in history.
sentences.cn: 但是,这个故事开始于历史上最著名的刺杀事件——杀害亚伯拉罕?

sentences.en: He narrowly escaped an assassination attempt (=  when someone tries but fails to kill someone else  ) .
sentences.cn: 他在一次暗杀行动中死里逃生。

sentences.en: I am a victim of character assassination.
sentences.cn: 我认为我是人身攻击的受害者.

sentences.en: The assassination gave rise to a sudden change in the election.
sentences.cn: 刺杀事件使得大选的形势发生了陡变.

sentences.en: The assassination of the political leader was detailed in all the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 所有的报纸都详细刊登了那名政治领袖被刺杀的消息.

sentences.en: The assassination was allowed to happen.
sentences.cn: 这次刺杀是被批准发生的.

sentences.en: The assassination was plotted by the prince.
sentences.cn: 这次行刺,可能是东宫所为.

sentences.en: The attack on him descended to a level of personal character assassination.
sentences.cn: 对他的攻击简直堕落到了人身攻击的地步.

sentences.en: The leader's assassination led to political convulsions, eg an attempt at revolution.
sentences.cn: 领导人遇剌引起了政治动乱.

sentences.en: The new of assassination of president Lincoln spread like wildfire.
sentences.cn: 林肯总统被刺杀的消息无径而走.

sentences.en: The news of the assassination of President Lincoln spread like wildfire.
sentences.cn: 林肯总统被刺的消息不腈而走.

sentences.en: The official report on the Kennedy assassination was whitewash.
sentences.cn: 肯尼迪谋杀案的官方报导是掩饰之辞.

sentences.en: The police stopped the assassination attempt on the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 警察挫败了针对首相的行刺企图.

sentences.en: They are already serving prison sentences for their part in the assassination.
sentences.cn: 他们因参与这起刺杀已经开始在监狱服刑了。

sentences.en: Why would chloe be at the scene of palmer's assassination, tracking agents?
sentences.cn: 科洛依为什么要在帕默遇害的现场跟踪特勤人员?
